entry.title: Today we’re thankful for your support of the Solidarity Meals...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is with Carlo Blanco and 2 others in Denver, Colorado.

Today we’re thankful for your support of the Solidarity Meals program since we launched it last May. Pictured here are Yessenia, Carlos, and Jeanette making turkey dinners, pozole, and punch. Many of these meals were distributed to unhoused folks in Denver today, and were incredibly grateful to the people who partnered with us to make that possible. While Thanksgiving is still taught in schools as a celebration of the help that Native American tribes offered white settlers, we know that this is a whitewashed retelling of the genocide against Indigenous people, violence that continues today. You can check the link in our bio for a zine from @seedingsovereignty about Indigenous resistance and ways to support. Solidarity with our Indigenous siblings today and every day.

entry.title: Ordered tamales? Pickup is 1:00 - 3:00 in Denver, Boulder, and...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

Ordered tamales? Pickup is 1:00 - 3:00 in Denver, Boulder, and Aurora.

Denver: 1400 N Lafayette St
Boulder: 5001 Pennsylvania Ave
Aurora: 312 Del Mar Cir

...

We’ll also be selling masks and agua fresca in Denver. Masks will also be available in Boulder.
See you soon!

See More

entry.title: A busy day, yes, but always thanking God and Jeanette who opened...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado is feeling blessed.

A busy day, yes, but always thanking God and Jeanette who opened this solidarity food program. thank you for always consuming our food, and thanks to the volunteers who help us a lot.

entry.title: ICE has NO justification for sending 50+ asylum seekers back to...
entry.content:
Sanctuary4All Colorado

ICE has NO justification for sending 50+ asylum seekers back to the genocide they fled. Call your representatives (and the ones listed on the flyer) today to demand humanitarian parole –– and please share to spread the word!
#StopTheDeportations
#DontLookAway
